Description.Text: Facilities Travellers are welcomed at the apartment hotel, which has a total of 3 rooms. The hotel features various services and facilities, including a baggage storage service, a café, a library and room service, for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with a living room and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is among the standard amenities of most rooms. The rooms have a double bed or a sofabed. Separate bedrooms are also available. Cots are available for younger travellers. All rooms offer a minibar, a microwave, internet access and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. Sports/Entertainment The terrace is a great place to while away the time.
